 Because our houses were not built for this ![üòÖ](https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/17.0.2/svg/1f605.svg)

 ![üßä](https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/17.0.2/svg/1f9ca.svg) Drip faucets (YES, all of them)  
 Hot + cold.  
   
 ![üî•](https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/17.0.2/svg/1f525.svg) Open sink cabinets  
 Especially on exterior walls.  
   
 ![üö™](https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/17.0.2/svg/1f6aa.svg) Block door drafts  
 Towels, blankets, or door snakes = works just fine.  
   
 ![üßØ](https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/17.0.2/svg/1f9ef.svg) Find your main water shut-off NOW  
 Not during a panic at 2am.

 Charge devices, use surge protect
